short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Metadot is a browser extension based non-custodial crypto wallet built to support the Polkadot & Kusama Ecosystem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send and receive tokens with Metadot browser extension wallet on Polkadot, Kusama and Westend test network from your browser.

Its a fast paced extension project that aims to support all possible relay chains and parachains in the future.
